Sentencas: A combined system containing solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine power plant, Rankine steam cycle and ammonia-water absorption refrigeration system is introduced and analyzed.
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: In this process, power, heat and cooling are produced.
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Energy and exergy analyses along with the economic factors are used to distinguish optimum operating point of the system.
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: The developed electrochemical model of the fuel cell is validated with experimental results.
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Thermodynamic package and main parameters of the absorption refrigeration system are validated.
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: The power output of the system is 500 kW.
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: An optimization problem is defined in order to finding the optimal operating point.
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Decision variables are current density, temperature of the exhaust gases from the boiler, steam turbine pressure (high and medium), generator temperature and consumed cooling water.
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Results indicate that electrical efficiency of the combined system is 62.4% (LHV).
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Produced refrigeration (at -10 degrees C) and heat recovery are 101 kW and 22.1 kW respectively.
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system

Sentencas: Investment cost for the combined system (without absorption cycle) is about 2917$ kW(-1).
Titulo: Optimal design of solid oxide fuel cell, ammonia-water single effect absorption cycle and Rankine steam cycle hybrid system
